mapper.select: SELECT player_id, action, item_tpl_id, amount, channel, extra_data FROM item_log WHERE player_id=#{playerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item_log (player_id, action, item_tpl_id, amount, channel, extra_data) VALUES (#{playerId}, #{action}, #{itemTplId}, #{amount}, #{channel}, #{extraData})
mapper.update: UPDATE item_log SET player_id=#{playerId}, action=#{action}, item_tpl_id=#{itemTplId}, amount=#{amount}, channel=#{channel}, extra_data=#{extraData} WHERE player_id=#{playerId}
